seo.title: TinaCMS developer certifications
seo.description: Earn a TinaCMS Developer Credly Badge for LinkedIn. The badge shows that you're a TinaCMS certified developer!

features.headline: TinaCMS developer certifications
features.text: We encourage all developers to earn their TinaCMS developer certification by getting TinaCMS up and running and completing the basics before implementing TinaCMS. This is essential to prove that you can effectively use TinaCMS on a real project!

questions.question: Step 1
Step 2
questions.answer:
Get TinaCMS running and deploy a site using [tina.io](https://tina.io) and [TinaCloud.](https://app.tina.io/signin)

* Feel free to start with one of the starter templates
* This can be a personal site or one youâ€™ve built for work

questions.question: Step 3
questions.answer:
Record a [Done Video](https://www.ssw.com.au/rules/record-a-quick-and-dirty-done-video/) explaining how Tina works. Here's what we're looking for:

* Who you are
* Why you are using TinaCMS
* Something you like about TinaCMS
* Any feedback or suggestions you have from your initial tryout

Tip: Have each suggestion's discussion or issue open in a separate tab

questions.question: Step 4
questions.answer: Post the video to YouTube (or another video platform) - make sure that it is public.

questions.question: Step 5
questions.answer: 5\. Optional - Post your video on social media (e.g., LinkedIn, Discord, X...).

questions.question: Step 6
questions.answer:
Email us at [badge@tina.io](mailto\:badge@tina.io). Include links to:

* Your video
* Your social media posts (if applicable)

questions.question: Step 7
questions.answer: The Tina team will review your video and issue you a LinkedIn badge (via \[Credly]\([https://info.credly.com/](https://info.credly.com/))).
